Sample.Name: CategoryAxis
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the use of category axis in chart.Category Axis is an indexed based axis that plots values based on its index in the data source.
Sample.Title: Category Axis

Sample.Name: NumericAxis
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the use of numerical axis in chart. Numerical axis is used to plot numeric values.
Sample.Title: Numerical Axis

Sample.Name: LogarithmicAxis
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the use of logarithmic axis in chart.
Sample.Title: Logarithmic Axis

Sample.Name: DateTimeAxis
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the use of date time axis
Sample.Title: DateTime Axis

Sample.Name: MultipleAxes
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the use of multiple axes in chart.
Sample.Title: Multiple Axes

Sample.Name: AxisCrossing
Sample.Description: Axis crossing feature changes the location at which the x-axis crosses the y-axis and vice versa.
Sample.Title: Axis Crossing

Sample.Name: Trackball
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the trackball feature. Trackball displays the tooltip for the data points that are closer to the point where you touch on the chart area.
Sample.Title: Trackball

Sample.Name: ZoomingAndPanning
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the zooming and panning capablities of chart.
Sample.Title: Zooming and panning

Sample.Name: Tooltip
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the tooltip capablities in chart. Tooltip feature is used to show information about the segment when you tap on the segment.
Sample.Title: Tooltip

Sample.Name: DataPointSelection
Sample.Description: Selection aloows you to highlight a data point. You can select a data point by tapping on it.
Sample.Title: Data Point Selection

Sample.Name: MultipleCircle
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the MultiCircle feature.
Sample.Title: Stacked Doughnut
Trendlines
Sample.Name: ChartTrendlines
Sample.Description: This sample showcases all types of trendlines.

Sample.Name: Legend
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the Legend feature.
Sample.Title: Legend Template

Sample.Name: GradientChart
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the gradient feature.
Sample.Title: Gradient Color

Sample.Name: Annotations
Sample.Description: Annotations are used to display metadata about a chart or series at a specific point of interest in the plotting area.
Sample.Title: Annotations

Sample.Name: LiveUpdate
Sample.Description: This Sample illustrates the performance of SfChart in real time update scenario.
Sample.Title: Live Update

Sample.Name: StripLines
Sample.Description: Strip lines are used to highlight specific range in the chart. They can be horizontal or vertical and also be made to optionally repeat at specific intervals.
Sample.Title: Strip Lines

Sample.Name: VerticalChart
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the vertical charts feature.
Sample.Title: Vertical Chart

Sample.Name: DataMarkerCustomization
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the customization of data markers. Data markers are used to provide information about the data points to the user.
Sample.Title: Data Marker

Sample.Name: AutoScrolling
Sample.Description: This sample shows the automatic scrolling of axis during real time updates.
Sample.Title: Auto Scrolling

Sample.Name: TechnicalIndicator
Sample.Description: Technical indicators are the base for technical analysis which is used to determine the future of financial stock or economic trends.
Sample.Title: Technical Indicator
